Name: Young Man Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: This particular Young Man is essentially a cognac-based Sweet Manhattan with a splash of orange curaçao. I've used rather more curaçao than the "2 Dashes" specified in Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Young Man Cocktail contains 156 calories
